title: Studio apartment in Victorian-era home—Utilities Included—Sept. 1
posting_body: ['Studio apartment on first floor of Victorian-era home in Lexington.', ' Convenient to Routes 2 and 95/128.', ' Private entrance.', '  French doors open to mini-deck.', ' High ceiling, hardwood floor.', ' Kitchenette includes sink, refrigerator, microwave, two burners, and tabletop oven, though no range.', ' Bathroom has tub/shower.', ' Large closet.', 'Unit is moderate sized (about 300 square feet altogether).', ' Basic furnishings available if you wish.', ' Some storage in basement.', ' Sorry, no laundry access.', ' Driveway parking.', ' Good for someone who enjoys the charm and occasional quirks of old houses.', '$900/month includes heat (steam by gas), electricity, hot water, and Internet.', ' Available Sept. 1 or sooner.', ' One year rental agreement.', ' No pets or smoking.', ' To move in, first + last month’s rent + $250 security deposit.', 'When replying, please introduce yourself briefly.', ' I’m an educator now working in a public library.', ' My two sons, 30 and 22, share my part of the house.', ' I’ve had rentals for many years.', 'Good for Lexington, Burlington, Woburn, Arlington, Waltham, Bedford, Concord, Tufts, Bentley, Lahey.']
